name: Picallo
description:
Picallo is a gorgeous, highly addictive game with modern sophisticated graphics and simple gameplay. Picallo has a very easy interface, anyone can pick up and play.

Game Center Leaderboards. Modern geometric design. Nostalgic gaming experience are just part of what makes Picallo fun. Play as a Picallo shooter in the center of the screen, and begin shooting everything before it reaches you. Follow Picallo online for early access and exciting updates.

Facebook: Picallo
Instagram: @PicalloApp
Twitter: @PicalloApp

For suggestions and support email: PlayPicallo@OurDevlife.com
